bibdata.title: Draft IEEE Standard for Terminology and Test Methods for Analog-to-Digital Converters
Draft IEEE Standard for Terminology and Test Methods for Analog-to-Digital Converters
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1241/D6.8, Oct 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The material presented in this standard is intended to provide common terminology and test methods for the testing and evaluation of analog-to-digital converters (ADCs). This standard considers only those ADCs whose output values have discrete values at discrete times, i.e. they are quantized and sampled.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
